QueryDefinition.Query:
with a as ( select d.*, ch.person_id as PersonId, case when primary_diagnosis = '' or primary_diagnosis = ' ' or primary_diagnosis is null then '0' else primary_diagnosis end as primary_diagnosis2 from {sc}.diagnosis as d JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND d.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE ), b as ( select encid, PersonId, diag_date,
replace(replace(replace(diagnosis_cd, chr(9), ''), chr(10), ''), chr(13), '') as diagnosis_cd, diagnosis_cd_type, case when diagnosis_cd_type IN ('ICD9') or (diagnosis_cd_type IN ('UNKNOWN') AND DIAG_DATE < 'October 1, 2015') then replace(replace(replace(replace(diagnosis_cd, '.', ''), chr(9), ''), chr(10), ''), chr(13), '') else NULL end as icd9, case when diagnosis_cd_type IN ('ICD10') or (diagnosis_cd_type IN ('UNKNOWN') AND DIAG_DATE >= 'October 1, 2015') then replace(replace(replace(replace(diagnosis_cd, '.', ''), chr(9), ''), chr(10), ''), chr(13), '') else NULL end as icd10, case when diagnosis_cd_type IN ('SNOMED') then replace(replace(replace(diagnosis_cd, chr(9), ''), chr(10), ''), chr(13), '') else NULL end as snomed, case when diagnosis_cd_type NOT IN ('ICD9', 'ICD10', 'SNOMED') then replace(replace(replace(diagnosis_cd, chr(9), ''), chr(10), ''), chr(13), '') else NULL end as others, admitting_diagnosis, discharge_diagnosis, poa, diagnosis_status, primary_diagnosis2 as primary_diagnosis, CASE WHEN admitting_diagnosis = '1' THEN 'ADMITTING_DIAGNOSIS;' ELSE '' END AS ad, CASE WHEN discharge_diagnosis = '1' THEN 'DISCHARGE_DIAGNOSIS;' ELSE '' END AS dd, CASE WHEN poa = '1' THEN 'POA;' ELSE '' END AS p, CASE WHEN primary_diagnosis2 = '1' THEN 'PRIMARY_DIAGNOSIS;' ELSE '' END AS pd from a )
select *, diagnosis_status + ';' + ad + dd + p + pd as condition_status_source_value, case when icd9 is not null then 1 else 0 end addicd9, case when icd10 is not null then 1 else 0 end addicd10, case when snomed is not null then 1 else 0 end addsnomed, case when icd9 is null and icd10 is null and snomed is null and diagnosis_cd_type NOT IN ('ICD9', 'ICD10', 'SNOMED') or diagnosis_cd_type is NULL then 1 else 0 end as unknown, case when trim(lower(diagnosis_status)) = 'possible diagnosis of' then 32899 when trim(lower(diagnosis_status)) = 'history of' then 1340204 when primary_diagnosis = '1' and admitting_diagnosis = '1' then 32901 when primary_diagnosis = '1' and coalesce(admitting_diagnosis, '0') = '0' and coalesce(discharge_diagnosis, '0') = '0' then 32902 when primary_diagnosis = '1' and coalesce(admitting_diagnosis, '0') = '0' and discharge_diagnosis = '1' then 32903 when coalesce(primary_diagnosis, '0') = '0' and admitting_diagnosis = '1' then 32890 when coalesce(primary_diagnosis, '0') = '0' and coalesce(admitting_diagnosis, '0') = '0' and discharge_diagnosis = '1' then 32896 else null end condition_status_concept_id from b order by PersonId
